meanings.definition: Used to attract attention or express surprise or joy.
meanings.sent1: Halloa! Look at that beautiful rainbow!
meanings.sent2: Halloa! I can't believe you're here!
meanings.sent3: Halloa! Did you see that squirrel doing a dance?
meanings.sent4: Halloa! The news of the victory spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: Halloa! The bright fireworks lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: To call out loudly or shout.
meanings.sent1: She halloaed for help when she got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The coach halloaed instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent3: The toddler halloaed with excitement when he saw the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: The wind halloaed through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The singer halloaed the high notes with passion during the concert.
